languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на женщину взгляд и чуть склоняет голову.{/n} "Госпожа Хейдари. С первого прибытия на Футфол наслышан о ваших коллегах и ваших личных талантах. Однако ваше полное имя от меня ускользнуло — не изволите напомнить?"

{n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на женщину взгляд и чуть склоняет голову.{/n} "Госпожа Хейдари. С первого прибытия на Футфол наслышан о ваших коллегах и ваших личных талантах. Однако ваше полное имя от меня ускользнуло — не изволите напомнить?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name has escaped me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

{n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name has escaped me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

{n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

{n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

{n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは彼女に視線を送り、かすかに首を傾げた。{/n}「ミストレス・ヘイダリ。フットフォールを初めて訪れて以来、あんたの同僚や個人的な才覚について聞いてきた。だが、残念ながら本名がどうしても思い出せない…失礼だが、もう一度名前を教えてくれないか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは彼女に視線を送り、かすかに首を傾げた。{/n}「ミストレス・ヘイダリ。フットフォールを初めて訪れて以来、あんたの同僚や個人的な才覚について聞いてきた。だが、残念ながら本名がどうしても思い出せない…失礼だが、もう一度名前を教えてくれないか？」

languages.text: {n}海因里希瞥了她一眼，微微侧过脸。{/n}“海达利女士，自从我来到落脚港的第一天起，我就一直在听说关于你的同僚，以及你个人才华的事情。不过我恐怕记不得你的全名了，你可不可以善意地帮我回忆一下？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希瞥了她一眼，微微侧过脸。{/n}“海达利女士，自从我来到落脚港的第一天起，我就一直在听说关于你的同僚，以及你个人才华的事情。不过我恐怕记不得你的全名了，你可不可以善意地帮我回忆一下？”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix la mira y ladea ligeramente la cabeza.{/n} «Señora Heydari. Desde mi primera visita a Paso, he oído hablar de sus compañeros y talentos personales. Sin embargo, me temo que su nombre completo se me escapa. ¿Sería tan amable de refrescarme la memoria?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix la mira y ladea ligeramente la cabeza.{/n} «Señora Heydari. Desde mi primera visita a Paso, he oído hablar de sus compañeros y talentos personales. Sin embargo, me temo que su nombre completo se me escapa. ¿Sería tan amable de refrescarme la memoria?».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lui lance un regard et incline légèrement la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Maîtresse Heydari. Depuis ma toute première visite à Castel, j'entends beaucoup parler de vos collègues et de vos talents personnels, mais j'ai bien peur de ne pas me rappeler votre nom complet... Auriez-vous l'amabilité de me rafraîchir la mémoire ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lui lance un regard et incline légèrement la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Maîtresse Heydari. Depuis ma toute première visite à Castel, j'entends beaucoup parler de vos collègues et de vos talents personnels, mais j'ai bien peur de ne pas me rappeler votre nom complet... Auriez-vous l'amabilité de me rafraîchir la mémoire ? »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sieht sie an und legt den Kopf leicht schief.{/n} "Herrin Heydari. Seit meinem ersten Besuch auf Footfall höre ich von Euren Kollegen und Euren Talenten. Aber Euer voller Name ist mir entfallen – würdet Ihr wohl mein Gedächtnis auffrischen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sieht sie an und legt den Kopf leicht schief.{/n} "Herrin Heydari. Seit meinem ersten Besuch auf Footfall höre ich von Euren Kollegen und Euren Talenten. Aber Euer voller Name ist mir entfallen – würdet Ihr wohl mein Gedächtnis auffrischen?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, kadına bakıp hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "Üstat Heydari. Binliman'a adım attığımdan beri meslektaşların ve şahsi yeteneklerine dair çok şey işittim. Yalnız tam adın dilimin ucunda ama çıkaramadım. Hafızamı tazeleyebilir misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix glances at her and tilts his head slightly.{/n} "Mistress Heydari. Ever since my first visit to Footfall, I've been hearing about your colleagues and personal talents. But I'm afraid your full name escapes me — would you kindly refresh my memory?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ona bakıp başını hafifçe eğiyor.{/n} "Üstat Heydari. Binliman'a adım attığımdan beri meslektaşlarınız ve kişisel yetenekleriniz hakkında birçok şey duydum. Fakat adınızı tam olarak hatırlayamıyorum. Hafızamı tazeleyebilir misiniz?"
